items.text: this one is held back a little, and the batsman is forward to thread a drive through the off side
pushed right up to Kayes, and he picks it off his toes for another single
much too short, sitting up off the track and asking to be hit. Mushfiqur rocks back to pull, but there's protection in the deep
gripping a little to turn in to Kayes, who stays deep in his crease and takes his score to 80 with another single into the leg side

items.preText: Mavuta is back into the attack. He was loose earlier on, and minutes ago dropped a catch. Can he make amends with the ball?
items.text: Mavuta starts round the wicket, and pushes a top spinner through to have Kayes cutting to point
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: now he's back over the wicket, and Kayes steps back to defend a legbreak
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: this lands on middle and leg and turns, and Kayes is untroubled collecting a quick single into the leg side field
the wrong 'un, and Mushfiqur reads it a little late, but well enough to defend
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: a full toss, and it's dealt with accordingly. Mushfiqur bent low to meet the ball and hammered his sweep in the air over long leg. There's no fielder there, easy runs
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: pushed down the leg side, and Mavuta's troubles continue as he concedes an extra
this is a legbreak, but it's a little too short and Mushfiqur waits in the crease to punch a drive out to deep cover

items.preText: Williams continues, and with Zimbabwe desperately needing wickets Masakadza is still at slip.
items.text: pitching on off and spinning away, allowing Mushfiqur to slap a single through the covers
worked to the left of Mavuta at midwicket. He sprints and dives to stop it, and they decide against a chancy single
items.shortText: Williams to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: clubbed back at the bowler, who gets across the crease to cut it off
items.shortText: Williams to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: much too short, and Kayes latches on to it powerfully. He didn't bother to keep his leg-side heave down, and the ball bounces and skids past Moor in the deep to take Bangladesh's score past 200
items.shortText: Williams to Imrul Kayes, FOUR runs

items.text: nudged into the leg side, and with the field spread that's one more
Mushfiqur stays very deep in the crease and places his backfoot punch into the gap at cover
a wrong 'un comes out ... wrong, and it's slipping down the leg side before Mushfiqur jumps back to pull to short fine leg. Jarvis stops the boundary in that position, but not the run
Mavuta switches to around the wicket, and he's worked into the leg side by Kayes
the singles continue to flow as the intensity of the game drops. Mushfiqur has acres of space to aim for on the off side
looped down the leg side, and there's one more in the extras column
another wide? No, this one pitches on middle and leg and flicks the edge of the pad on the way down the leg side
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: a touch short, and it's pulled powerfully out into the deep.
that's a better delivery. This looked like a slider of sorts, and it hurried on to Mushfiqur as he stepped back into his crease. He was looking for a leg side shot, but had to defend instead
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: With the game rapidly racing away from them, Zimbabwe are bringing Jarvis back for a final roll of the dice.
items.text: he starts with a full ball on off stump and Kayes defends.
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, no run
